Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Radisson Blu Riverside Hotel, Gothenburg in Gothenburg, you'll be in the business district and minutes from Gothenburg Radio Museum and close to Maritima Museum. This 5-star hotel is within close proximity of Keillers Park and Jarntorget.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 265 individually decorated guestrooms, featuring minibars and flat-screen televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Bathrooms have bathtubs or showers and hair dryers. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and coffee/tea makers.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Treat yourself with massages and facials. You're sure to appreciate the recreational amenities, which include 3 spa tubs, a health club, and a sauna.

Dining
Grab a bite to eat at the hotel's restaurant, which features a bar, or stay in and take advantage of 24-hour room service. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. A complimentary buffet breakfast is served daily.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a 24-hour business center, express check-in, and express check-out. Event facilities at this hotel consist of a conference center and meeting rooms. Self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.


Check-in time starts at 3 PM Check-out time is noon
Grab a bite to eat at the hotel's restaurant, which features a bar, or stay in and take advantage of 24-hour room service. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. A complimentary buffet breakfast is served daily.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

With a stay at Radisson Blu Riverside Hotel, Gothenburg in Gothenburg, you'll be in the business district and minutes from Gothenburg Radio Museum and close to Maritima Museum. This 5-star hotel is within close proximity of Keillers Park and Jarntorget.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Gothenburg Radio Museum - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Keillers Park - 0.9 km / 0.5 mi
Jarntorget - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
Maritime Museum and Aquarium - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
Casino Cosmopol Gothenburg - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
Queen Christina's Hunting Lodge - 1.2 km / 0.7 mi
Maritima Museum - 1.2 km / 0.7 mi
Masthugget Church - 1.2 km / 0.8 mi
Fish Market - 1.2 km / 0.8 mi
Oscar Fredrik Church - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi
Gothenburg Opera - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi
Kronhuset - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi
Kronhusbodarna - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi
Rambergsvallen - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi
City Museum - 1.4 km / 0.8 mi

The nearest airports are:
Gothenburg (GSE-Gothenburg City) - 9 km / 5.6 mi
Gothenburg (GOT-Landvetter) - 21.5 km / 13.4 mi

The preferred airport for Radisson Blu Riverside Hotel, Gothenburg is Gothenburg (GOT-Landvetter).

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
